title: STAT+: Lilly’s next-gen obesity drug delivers major weight loss in Phase 3 trial, but with many discontinuations
description: Eli Lilly's next-gen obesity drug delivered major weight loss in a trial, but some patients stopped using it after losing too much weight.
content: Eli Lilly's next-gen obesity drug delivered major weight loss in a trial, but some patients stopped using it after losing too much weight.
